column1: 1594252127634874370,1594252127634874370@OlajuyinE This guy was my senior Prefect boy back then at Corpus Christi College, Ilawe Ekiti. There was a day he slapped me so loud on the assembly ground, without doing anything. Later, he told me to kneel down and beat me with belt. I don't know the kind of secondary schools we have. t_end
